We all know that Chinese students usually study very hard for long  _ , This is very good ,but it doesn't _ a lot ,for an effective student must have enough sleep ,enough food and enough rest and  _ . Every day you need to go out for a walk or visit some friends or some nice places. It's good for your _ .

So you will think you're learning  _  and you may give up. This can last for days or even weeks, yet you  needn't  give up, and at some point your language study will again take another big  _ .
